DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness efficacy Dynamic Optimal Timing ( DOT ) , app-based method family planning use via Android device , woman use method avoid pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Efficacy Dynamic Optimal Timing , Smart Phone App Avoiding Pregnancy : Observational Study
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , efficacy study Dynamic Optimal Timing ( Dot ) , app-based method family plan provide user information daily probability pregnancy base length menstrual cycle time . To use app , woman enter first day menstrual period . Women provide information daily risk pregnancy day , use avoid unprotected sex . The study conduct Institute Reproductive Health ( IRH ) Georgetown University . The study examine relationship woman 's use Dot method ( perfect typical use ) pregnancy outcome end study . The study also look several additional secondary outcome , perceive partner support method , coital frequency fertile time , intention continue use method study discontinuation , well several variable around acceptability conduct efficacy study via app . The study recruit woman already download DOT app Android phone . The study recruit woman previously set intent Dot app `` avoid pregnancy '' enter second period start date app . Eligible woman : 18 39 year old , pregnant use hormonal contraception last 3 month , sexually active relationship male partner , desire avoid pregnancy least one year . Women consent enter study activate `` research module '' within Dot app . This module essentially `` overlay '' DOT app . It change app way , provide data platform researcher obtain self-reported data study participant daily sexual history collect periodic survey participant topic pertain study primary secondary outcome . Women report pregnancy , fail enter new cycle start date within 40-day window allow Dot method , contact sent urine pregnancy test , confirm pregnancy status . Participants complete maximum 13 menstrual cycle ( approximately 1 year ) study .
DOC.criteria: Have download Android app select use pregnancy prevention indicate interested participating study ; Have provide contact information learn study call call center ; Are 18 39 time admission ; Have menstrual cycle 2040 day time enrollment Are sexually active male partner ; Have pregnant use hormonal method family planning within past three month Are willing install password biometric protection phone ensure confidentiality study data ; Live U.S. Women meet one inclusion criterion exclude study .
